name: CreateGist
description:
Create a new gist with one or more files on GitHub.

Use this tool to add a new gist containing one or more code files on GitHub. Avoid naming files with the 'gistfile' format followed by a number, as it may conflict with GitHub's internal naming scheme.

parameters.name: gist_content
parameters.description: A JSON object containing 'description' (string), 'files' (object with filenames as keys and content as values), and 'public' (boolean) to define the gist.

files.description: Names and content for the files that make up the gist

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.
